Sejak itu, Sak cuba meyakinkan Tin bahawa kehidupan seorang penjenayah bukanlah sesuatu yang harus dia kejar.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Maya mengambil perkhidmatan bodyguard bernama Rahul untuk menjaga keselamatan dan anaknya Aiman dari gangguan bekas suami bernama Mikhail. Ika isteri Mikhail akan diberi harta kekayaan bapanya sekiranya mereka mempunyai anak. Ika selalu mendesak Mikhail mendapatkan anak kandungnya dari Maya. Mereka bercadang menggunakan mahkamah untuk mendapatkan Aiman. Farish pula sebagai bodyguard kepada Adam anak kepada Dato’ Nora, Adam telah terlibat dengan Kumpulan Kobra yang melakukan jenayah. Oleh itu Farish terpaksa menyertai kumpulan penjahat tersebut untuk menjaga Adam. Ryan sebagai bodyguard kepada Eliza, dia menjaga keselamatan Eliza dari diculik oleh penjahat. Eliza di bawa oleh Rashid berjumpa dengan ibunya yang sakit. Elisa memberi RM 80 ribu untuk perbelanjaan pembedahannya. Ryan yang menjadi bodyguard Datin Maziah isteri kepada Dato’ Jailani mendapat maklumat Datin Maziah mempunyai hubungan sulit dengan Badrul. Perkara ini dimaklumkan kepada Dato’ Zailani. Mereka sebagai bodyguard memberi maklumat harian kepada Nasha sebagai ketua jabatan. Ryan secara sembunyi masih berterusan memberi bunga kepada Nasha

programme.title: Belaban Hidup: Infeksi Zombie
programme.desc: Jauh di hutan larangan Borneo, tinggal orang asli Dayak. Kampung mereka telah diserang oleh zombi. Pertempuran antara pahlawan Dayak yang sengit dan zombi bermula.

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep4
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Rashid difitnah oleh Amran, dia dikatakan mempunyai hubungan cinta dengan Rohani. Ini menimbulkan kemarahan Eliza kepada Rashid. Danial sebagi bodyguard terus menjaga keselamatan Eliza khususnya dari dicederakan oleh Amran. Eliza meminta Danial menyiasat aktiviti Amran dan memaklumkan kepadanya. programme.title: Maama Machan
programme.desc: Ketua kampung menolak perkahwinan cinta di kampung. Tapi, apa yang dia akan buat bila dapat tahu anak dia sendiri tengah bercinta?

programme.title: Bodyguard Ep4
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Rashid difitnah oleh Amran, dia dikatakan mempunyai hubungan cinta dengan Rohani. Ini menimbulkan kemarahan Eliza kepada Rashid. programme.title: Bodyguard Ep8
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ryan sebagai bodyguard kepada Dato' Amir memujuk Mak Jah menerima wang pemberian Dato' Amir, beliau menolaknya. Dato' Amir menjadikan Nasha sebagai anak angkatnya. Mak Jah tinggal dengan Nasha sementara waktu. Dalam kes berasingan, Farish masih menjadi bodyguard Adam. Atan memujuk Adam masuk ke dalam hutan untuk membolehkan Zack menculik Adam tetapi gagal kerana Farish berjaya menumpaskannya. D anial bodyguard kepada Eliza. Azizah emak Rashid tidak membenarkan Rashid berjumpa dengan Eliza setelah mengetahui Dato' Zaidi adalah bapa kepada Eliza. Mereka pernah berkahwin suatu masa lalu. Eliza meminta Danial mengekori Rashid yang dikatakan telah balik ke kampung. Rahul, bodyguard Maya diminta mencari Boboy yang telah dibawa oleh Mikhail dan isterinya Zulaikha ke rumah ibu bapa Zulaikha. Maya menerima saman untuk hadir ke mahkamah bagi permohonan jagaan Boboy oleh Mikhail. Semua maklumat aktiviti harian bodyguard ini dilaporkan kepada ketuanya Nasha.

programme.title: Siccin 1
programme.desc: Öznur adalah seorang wanita muda dan cantik. Dia mempunyai cinta platonik sejak kecil kepada Kudret, yang merupakan sepupunya. Kudret bagaimanapun telah berkahwin dengan seorang wanita bernama Nisa dan sangat gembira. Cemburu, Öznur menggunakan ilmu hitam yang dahsyat untuk mengubahnya supaya dia dan Kudret akan bersama. Walau bagaimanapun, dia tidak bersedia untuk kejahatan yang ditimbulkan oleh mantera ini

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep13
programme.desc: Ep. 13 memaparkan kisah Sohot telah diberi amaran oleh Hariman agar beliau berdiam diri sahaja semasa mencari buloh nanti. Sohot telah berjaya mengambil batu ajaib dari Zara tetapi secara tibatiba batu ajaib telah diambil oleh jin bernama Rakib, tanpa pengetahuannya dan ditukarkan menjadi gula-gula. Sohot membuat layang-layang untuk Zara sementara Salim membuat layang-layang untuk Haikal untuk mengambil hati kedua-dua budak tersebut. Johan terlihat Suraya bersama-sama Cikgu Razif dan anaknya makan di sebuah restoran lalu membuat hatinya resah gelisah serta cemburu. Sementara itu Hariman sibuk hendak mencari batu permata sehingga sanggup hendak berjumpa dengan bomoh. Jin Rakib telah menyamar menjadi seorang bomoh lalu menipu Hariman dan juga Salim apabila mereka mendapat satu bungkusan yang diperkatakan oleh bomoh tersebut bahawa didalamnya ada batu permata tetapi setelah dibuka didapati hanya gula-gula dalam bungkusan tersebut. Bomoh tersebut ghaib begitu sahaja dan menjadikan Hariman bertambah geram dan marah.

programme.title: Terowong Ep4
programme.desc: Episod 4 bertajuk 'Diari' mengisahkan seorang pelajar bernama Maya dalam keadaan sedih berseorangan dan berkata-kata pada diri sendiri, mengapa semua orang membencinya. Semasa Maya sedang bercakap-cakap bersendirian di dalam terowong tersebut, ada sebuah diari telah berkata-kata dengannya dan berjanji akan menolongnya. Maya yang berdendam dengan Yana dan semua itu tercatat didalam diarinya. Maya sudah berjanji dengan puaka yang berada di dalam terowong tersebut, bahawa dia akan memberikan atau menhadiahkan seorang mangsa sebagai habuan (makanan) kepada puaka tersebut kerana menolongnya menjadi cantik. Maya mahu membalas dendam terhadap Yana dan meminta pertolongan dengan dairi berpuaka. Hantu yang menjadi kawan Maya juga memusuhi Yana dan Maya telah berubah menjadi lebih cantik dan sedikit sombong. Kawan-kawan Yana telah meninggalkan Yana untuk berkawan dengan Maya. Kawan Mustafa, Yus berkata bahawa Maya itu berkawan dengan syaitan dan serta menasihatkan Mustafa supaya menjaga dirinya agar tidak menjadi mangsa bunuh Maya. Yus telah menjadi mangsa kedua hantu tersebut, setelah Maya berdendam dan marah terhadap Yus. Setelah Maya terlihat Mustafa berdua-dua dalam sebuah restoran dan Maya nampak marah kepada Mustafa. Akhirnya Mustafa telah menjadi mangsa hantu tersebut, Maya telah pulangkan semula diari itu kepada hantu atau penunggu terowong tersebut kerana kecewa dan puaka itu telah membunuh kekasihnya Mustafa. Pada masa yang sama Yana pula telah mengambil alih menjaga 'diari' puaka tersebut

programme.title: Bisikan Iblis
programme.desc: Di sekolah semua perempuan, akan sentiasa ada kematian misteri setiap tahun, dan Nany didaftarkan di sekolah ini.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Semalam di Malaysia
programme.desc: Victor Abdullah, penyanyi terkenal yang menetap di Malaysia berkenalan dengan Sandra, mahasiswa di Indonesia. Rumimah, pembantu rumah Sandra ternyata bukanlah seperti apa yang disangka Sandra. Rahsia dan kisah silam terungkit kembali apabila suami dan anak lelakinya yang disangka telah meninggal dunia sebenarnya masih hidup. Pertemuan semula mereka telah membongkar segalanya.

programme.title: Bila Hati Telah Retak
programme.desc: Diceraikan oleh suami kaki perempuan, seorang wanita memulakan kehidupan baru. Bekerja sebagai bidan kerajaan - namun tidak disenangi seorang bidan tradisional. Pelbagai tohmahan dilemparkan kepadanya sebagai cara untuk dia diusir keluar tetapi bapa saudaranya ada memberikan sokongan moral. Setelah satu insiden berlaku di kampung itu, penduduk lain mula menerimanya.

programme.title: Melati Putih
programme.desc: Melati bercita-cita tinggi tetapi tidak dapat melaksanakannya kerana tergoda dengan seorang doktor muda. Akibat hubungan dengan doktor itu, nama baiknya telah tercemar. Seorang pemuda cacat di kampung itu jatuh hati padanya tetapi cinta lelaki itu dipermainkannya. Setelah Melati dikecewakan oleh doktor itu, barulah dia sedar cinta suci si pemuda itu.

programme.title: Semalam di Malaysia
programme.desc: Victor Abdullah, penyanyi terkenal yang menetap di Malaysia berkenalan dengan Sandra, mahasiswa di Indonesia. Rumimah, pembantu rumah Sandra ternyata bukanlah seperti apa yang disangka Sandra. Rahsia dan kisah silam terungkit kembali apabila suami dan anak lelakinya yang disangka telah meninggal dunia sebenarnya masih hidup. Pertemuan semula mereka telah membongkar segalanya.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Esok
programme.desc: Kisah sebuah keluarga yang mengalami kejatuhan moral kerana pegangan agama yang tidak utuh. Talib yang menghidapi barah harus melalui pelbagai konflik sementara menunggu masa untuk pergi. Anaknya, Jalil mula bersikap derhaka manakala anak keduanya, Ayu hamil luar nikah. Perasaan dikhianati dan ingin mengkhianati mula menguasai diri, pengakhirannya membawa kepada satu kematian.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Tiada Esok Bagimu
programme.desc: Ghazlan seorang arkitek yang mempunyai dua orang anak, Amir dan Emi. Akibat satu peristiwa yang menyebabkan kematian Emi, Ghazlan menjadi buta kerana terlalu sedih. Selepas itu Ghazlan bersama isterinya mengambil seorang anak angkat yang dinamakan Emi. Identiti sebenar Emi dirahsiakan sehingga dia dewasa. Satu tragedi berlaku kepada Emi sehingga dia nekad untuk mencari ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Penghujung Malam
programme.desc: Razak yang telah merantau membawa diri setelah rumahtangganya runtuh kira-kira 15 tahun yang lalu telah kembali ke Malaysia. Niatnya hanya satu, mahu membina semula rumahtangganya dan memastikan anaknya Rita yang kini berusia 19 tahun dan merupakan seorang penyanyi terkenal mendapat kasih sayang seorang bapa. Malangnya, bekas isteri dan anaknya itu tidak mahu menerima Razak malah menaruh perasaan benci yang amat sangat terhadap dirinya.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato’ Iskandar. Dato’ Iskandar ingin menjodohkan Milah dengan anaknya, Ikhsan namun anaknya itu berkeras hati tidak mahu menurut kemahuan bapanya. Demi mengelakkan daripada menanggung malu, Milah bersetuju dinikahkan dengan Jiman, pengurus syarikat Dato’ Iskandar. Milah dan Jiman terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya sehingga mengakibatkan Jiman lumpuh dan mengalami kecederaan otak yang serius. Keadaan menjadi semakin teruk apabila Ikhsan memaksa Jiman untuk melepaskan Milah kerana dia ingin memperisterikan Milah.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Esok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Kematian satu-satunya anak miliknya akibat leukemia mengubah hidup seorang pegawai polis. ASP Zamri kemudiannya bertemu dengan Marina dan menjalinkan hubungan sulit bersamanya. Pelbagai halangan perlu dihadapinya oleh kerana kerjanya sebagai seorang pegawai polis. Akhirnya, Marina dan Zamri pun berkahwin dan dikurniakan anak - namun anak tersebut diserahkan kepada isteri pertama Zamri, Faridah untuk dijaga.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Selepas kematian isteri tercinta, Mahmud, seorang hartawan telah berkahwin dengan Zubaidah, yang merupakan janda anak satu. Mahmud mempunyai seorang anak lelaki bernama Anuar dan anak angkat perempuan bernama Mira. Baharum, anak kepada Zubaidah berkawan baik dengan Mira. Apabila mereka meningkat dewasa, hubungan mereka bertambah erat dan saling mencintai antara satu sama lain. Anuar tidak senang dengan perhubungan itu kerana khuatir harta ayahnya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Esok Untuk Siapa
programme.desc: Milah seorang peragawati yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat perusahaan batik milik Dato’ Iskandar. programme.title: Melati Putih
programme.desc: Melati bercita-cita tinggi tetapi tidak dapat melaksanakannya kerana tergoda dengan seorang doktor muda. Akibat hubungan dengan doktor itu, nama baiknya telah tercemar. Seorang pemuda cacat di kampung itu jatuh hati padanya tetapi cinta lelaki itu dipermainkannya. Setelah Melati dikecewakan oleh doktor itu, barulah dia sedar cinta suci si pemuda itu.

programme.title: Semalam di Malaysia
programme.desc: Victor Abdullah, penyanyi terkenal yang menetap di Malaysia berkenalan dengan Sandra, mahasiswa di Indonesia. Rumimah, pembantu rumah Sandra ternyata bukanlah seperti apa yang disangka Sandra. Rahsia dan kisah silam terungkit kembali apabila suami dan anak lelakinya yang disangka telah meninggal dunia sebenarnya masih hidup. Pertemuan semula mereka telah membongkar segalanya.

programme.title: Bila Hati Telah Retak
programme.desc: Diceraikan oleh suami kaki perempuan, seorang wanita memulakan kehidupan baru. Bekerja sebagai bidan kerajaan - namun tidak disenangi seorang bidan tradisional. Pelbagai tohmahan dilemparkan kepadanya sebagai cara untuk dia diusir keluar tetapi bapa saudaranya ada memberikan sokongan moral. Setelah satu insiden berlaku di kampung itu, penduduk lain mula menerimanya.

programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri

programme.title: Sikit Punya Gila
programme.desc: Berkisar tentang dua orang pemuda kampung berhijrah ke bandar untuk mencari kekayaan. Setelah beberapa lama berusaha mereka masih dibelegu dengan masalah kewangan. Oleh itu mereka mula terjebak dalam pelbagai kegiatan judi sebagai jalan mudah untuk cepat kaya.

programme.title: The Spiral
programme.desc: Jon Caine, pensyarah universiti yang dihormati, didapati hilang. Tiga bulan kemudian dia muncul semula dan membunuh sekumpulan orang awam dan polis di sebuah kafe. Selepas ditangkap oleh Detektif Inspektor Aleana, dia dihantar ke hospital mental untuk disoal siasat oleh pakar psikologi jenayah, Dr Melanie Surya. Melanie tidak lama kemudian mengetahui bahawa kewujudannya adalah kunci kepada perubahan mendadak Jon dalam tingkah laku dan akhirnya, dia membuka kunci rahsia Jon yang telah disimpan dalam dirinya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep8
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Past Tense
programme.desc: Kehidupan seorang wanita muda menjadi kucar kacir apabila diri masa depannya muncul tetapi tidak seperti yang dia harapkan.

programme.title: Klu
programme.desc: Tuan Hudson yang kini dalam dilema apabila perniagaannya hampir bankrap, mengambil kesempatan ini dengan memujuk Bob supaya merapatkan diri dengan Maria. Tuan Hudson mahu mengerjakan harta Datuk Nordin sekiranya Bob berjaya dijodohkan dengan Maria.

programme.title: Korban Damage Cucu Oma
programme.desc: Arfi, baru hari pertama menaiki teksi motosikal dia terpaksa diselar oleh suami penumpang kerana disangka menjalinkan hubungan sulit dengan isterinya. Bukan Arfi sahaja, motosikalnya juga terpaksa menjadi mangsa dan terpaksa dibawa ke bengkel. Takut digantung tugas, Arfi sanggup menggunakan basikal tuanya untuk mengambil tempahan.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep137
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Star Ep71
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep16
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep96
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep138
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Tau Tau Nikah Panik Ga Neng? Paniklah Masa Enggak
programme.desc: Terpaksa berkahwin pada usia muda kerana keadaan yang memaksa. Melody dan Rafael terpaksa melalui segalanya. Tiba-tiba muncul Cindy, si bekas kekasih yang masih sayangkan Rafael.

programme.title: Suster El Ep12
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep18
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Aku dan Kamu Di Prok Prok Jadi Cinta
programme.desc: Alin dan Ajun adalah rakan sekelas, tetapi mereka tidak pernah serasi. Setiap kali mereka bertemu, mereka selalu bertengkar. Alin yang berada dalam golongan yang berada tidak suka bergaul dengan Ajun yang bekerja sebagai ahli silap mata dalam majlis hari jadi. Tetapi siapa sangka, apabila keluarga Alin jatuh miskin, hanya Ajun yang sentiasa ada untuk Alin. Alin mula menyukai Ajun. Lalu, bagaimana dengan perasaan Ajun terhadap Alin?

programme.title: Temu Lawak Ep2
programme.desc: Temu Lawak adalah rancangan komedi dengan kumpulan legenda Srimulat yang akan membuat kemunculan semula melalui rancangan ini. Turut dimeriahkan oleh ramai pelawak dan artis undangan. Di Temu Lawak, pelawak bersatu kembali dengan kisah kontemporari yang dibalut dengan komedi gaya Srimulat.

programme.title: Tau Tau Nikah Panik Ga Neng? Paniklah Masa Enggak
programme.desc: Terpaksa berkahwin pada usia muda kerana keadaan yang memaksa. Melody dan Rafael terpaksa melalui segalanya. Tiba-tiba muncul Cindy, si bekas kekasih yang masih sayangkan Rafael.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep35
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. programme.title: Anak Pembuat Nisan Menjadi Pengusaha Pupuk Sukses
programme.desc: Demi anak mereka, Bagas dapat melanjutkan pelajaran ke universiti. Ibu Indah mencari pendapatan tambahan dengan menawarkan perkhidmatan dobi dan menggosok pakaian. Ini kerana suaminya hanya seorang pembuat batu nisan. Hingga satu tragedi melanda keluarga mereka, dan Bagas meneruskan perniagaan ayahnya menjadi seorang pembuat batu nisan.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep36
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class…

programme.title: The Witch: Part 1. The Subversion
programme.desc: A young girl escaped from a government facility and lost all her memory. Years later, when she appears on a nationally televised show, mysterious faces from her past life reappear.

programme.title: Cafe Midnight
programme.desc: Yoon went searching for her groom Taeyoung who didn't show up on the wedding day. She arrives at a strange place called 'Cafe Midnight' by chance and found a younger Taeyoung from the past.

programme.title: Warriors Of The Dawn
programme.desc: To avoid invading Japanese forces, King Seonjo escapes to the Ming Empire. In his place, Prince Gwanghae leads the royal court and confronts the enemies with the help of proxy soldiers led by To-woo.

programme.title: Dancing Queen
programme.desc: A married couple in the midst of their mundane lives decides to pursue their lost dreams. The husband finds himself accidentally running for Mayor of Seoul and his wife decides to become a pop singer.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Kingmaker
programme.desc: A politician met a talented campaign strategist who helped him in becoming the strongest presidential election candidate. Yet conflicts deepen as the he disagrees with the latter on his ideologies.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: A Man Who Was Superman
programme.desc: Soo-jung met a man who claimed himself as a "superman" and loves to give a helping hand to people in need. She then realizes the story behind his seemingly weird behavior...

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other’s backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: A Tiger In Winter
programme.desc: On a winter day, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's apartment. He then begins a job as a substitute driver at night. One night, he meets his ex-girlfriend who now works as a novelist.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Marathon
programme.desc: An autistic 20 year-old man with a knack for running goes against all odds and trains for a marathon.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Sunset In My Hometown
programme.desc: When an unsuccessful rapper returns to his hometown to visit his sick father, he reconnects with the friends and family he left behind long ago.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Police’s Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: The Whispering
programme.desc: A woman and her boyfriend are among a group of students who are on a trip to celebrate their graduation. They wander into an abandoned amusement park and discover the "House of Horrors".

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.desc: Mums and experts are invited to share their personal experiences and interpretation on parenting. The program aims to relieve the anxiety of parents by providing the latest, most comprehensive and sincere parenting information.

programme.title: All Reviving Ep12
programme.desc: A documentary cultural program focuses on intangible cultural heritage. Yang Lan, the Chinese media proprietor & journalist, brings us to visit the inheritors of 11 intangible cultural heritage skills with cultural successors, discovers the essence of Chinese excellent traditional culture.

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 3 Ep12
programme.desc: Nicky Wu and new members like Raymond Lam, Ryan Ding, Lin Yun and Zhao Xiaotang are invited to serve as the members of Star Chaser, letting go the trivialities and troubles of daily life and recalling the sincere and touching relationship under the starry sky. Let’s share the sense of healing in the trip!

programme.title: Camping Life Season 2 Ep6
programme.desc: The initiator William Chan invited his friends, Wei Daxun, Lil Ghost, Di Yang, Yin Zheng & Zhang Yanqi, to complete 5 themed camps with building different kind of ideal life portraits.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep4344
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46484649

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1825
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3630
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3632
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2671
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep951
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1825
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3632
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46514652
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep4748
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2056
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep161
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of “Young and Dangerous”, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter’s diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: A Beautiful Moment
programme.desc: An ageing bachelor finally meets the girl of his dreams and proposes marriage, only to discover her psychologist stepmom was his first love long ago. The future in-laws initially pretend not to know each other but as the wedding date gets nearer, the rekindling of long-dormant feelings develops into a cross-generational love triangle.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult
programme.desc: The movie consists of three tales about the horrors lurking in dark corners of the city. A young pop star goes back into depression when spooky things happen in her new home; an online influencer performs live in a mall, but it ends up being a livestream of his death; the residents of a tenement building battle a mysterious figure in the stairwell.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: Bai Xing Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel located in Qian Dao Lake, Hang Zhou, with a service level only worthy of a four-star hotel. The head office sent Cruella Koo, a tough executive, to lead reforms for the hotel and upgrade the employees’ performance to reach the five-star level.

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: Andy Lau is a monk turned body-builder, with the gift of foreseeing people's lives. He befriends a female cop (Cecilia Cheung) and uses his gift to change the force of Karma and her destiny. The movie is ultimately a Buddhist parable about the nature of karma.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Shaolin vs Evil Dead Ultimate Power
programme.desc: In this kung fu vampire sequel, a Shaolin monk takes on a Taoist-priest-turns-evil-vampire to stop his killing spree.

programme.title: Needing You
programme.desc: Office politics and love between co-workers complicates the lives of two computer-company employees in this romantic comedy starring Andy Lau and Sammi Cheng.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kong’s Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong’s ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension…

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness…

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: A hijacking of a police van occurs when the Police Commissioner is away from Hong Kong. Deputy Commissioner Lee leads a rescue operation code-named Cold War. Fellow Deputy Commissioner Sean moves to take control from Lee as he thinks Lee is emotionally affected by his son being held hostage, but the efforts end up threatening both their reputation.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when De’s eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Cheh’s epic “The Water Margin”, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy “House of 72 tenants”, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Melody Of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s “a-go-go” era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and managed to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King’s sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: Carry On Doctors And Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him…

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - “Black Leopard”. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of “Black Leopard”, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Li Ching plays, Ah Chiao, a girl from a rural village stranded in the city, who befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are all poor, but Ah Chiao’s fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she ultimately learns money can't buy happiness.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: Danger Has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clan's fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents' death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Ying’s father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt “Shaolin Hand Lock” from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Ling’s house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: The Lady Hermit
programme.desc: The Lady Hermit hides away for years to plot revenge after being defeated by the evil Black Knight. Young swordswoman Tsui Ping is determined to take down Black Knight herself and begs Lady Hermit to teach her martial arts skills. The Black Knight's days are numbered when the Lady Hermit and her protege perfect the technique to take him down.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up - will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clan’s disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score “The Proud One”. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clan’s leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma breaks when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: Thirunaal
programme.desc: Tamil Action Romantic Movie, Starring, Jiiva, Nayanatara, Gopinath, Meenakshi,Sharath

programme.title: Thiruttu Payale 2
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Bobby Simha, Prasanna, Amala Paul & Others

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Tamil Action Comedy Movie, Starring, Arvind Swamy, Amala Paul, Baby Nainika, Soori, Master Raghavan & Others

programme.title: Taana
programme.desc: Tamil Action, Comedy Horror Film, Starring, Vaibhav, Nandita Sweta, Yogi Babu & Others

programme.title: Mishan Impossible
programme.desc: Tamil comedy thriller film, Taapsee Pannu, Harsh Roshan, Bhannu Prakshan & Jayateertha Molugu

programme.title: World Television Premiere - Stand Up Rahul
programme.desc: Tamil coming-of-Age Comedy Film, Starring - Raj Tarun, Varsha Bollamma

programme.title: Bimbisara
programme.desc: Tamil fantasy action film, Starring - Nadumuri Kalyana Ram, Catherine Tresa, Samyuktha Menon & Prakash Raj

programme.title: Kadugu

programme.title: 7 Naatkal
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, M.S. Bhaskar, Chinnijayanth, Nassar, Nikesha Patel, Shakthi Vasudevan & Others

programme.title: Vikram Vedha
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Action Film, Starring, Vijay Sethupathi, R. Madhavan, Kathir, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar

programme.title: Boomerang
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, Atharvaa, Megha Akash, Indhuja, Upen Patel and RJ Balaji

programme.title: Tuck Jagadish
programme.desc: Action Film, starring Nani, Ritu Varma and Jagapathi Babu

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Tamil Horror Thriller Film, Starring, Nayantara, Thambi Ramaiah, Harish Uthaman, Sulile Kumar, Shan & Others

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: Tamil Coming-of-Age Comedy Film, Starring, Siva Karthikeyan, Bindhu Mathavi, Vimal, Soori & Regina Cassandra

programme.title: World Television Premiere - Tofuman
programme.desc: Korean animated comedy film, set in the Han Dynasty. Liu An, the royal lord of Huainan, is addicted to cultivate immortality. Beans are collected for making immortality pills but transform to humanoid lives.

programme.title: Theeni
programme.desc: romantic comedy movie starring Ashok Selvan, Ritu Varma and Nithya Menen

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Ammani
programme.desc: Ammani talks about the life of Salamma and her relationship with an 82-year-old lady Ammani. Salamma works day and night to meet the daily expenses of her family, but her family does not care about that and they are solely interested only on money. What does Salamma do, when she couldn't make her children understand the reality? The film answers this question very beautifully in a simple,yet powerful manner

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Kappal
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, Vaibhav Reddy, Sonam Bajwa, Karunakaran, VTV Ganesh & Others

programme.title: Iit Krishnamurthy
programme.desc: Tamil Mystery Thriller film, Starring - Dandamudi Pruthvi, Maira Doshi & Vinay Varma

programme.title: Ghazi
programme.desc: Tamil War Thriller, Starring, Rana Daggubati, Kay Kay Menon, Atul Kulkarni, Naaser, Om Puri & Others

programme.title: Maanikya
programme.desc: Vijay and Manasa's families have been at each other's throat's since the past 25 years. However, things take a turn when they fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Super Duper
programme.desc: Two swindlers take up a kidnapping assignment for some quick money. However, when they end up kidnapping the wrong woman, they land in trouble with a drug lord.

programme.title: Ulkuthu
programme.desc: Raja moves to a coastal hamlet and soon opposes the tyrannical ways of Kaka Mani, a local money-monger who harasses those who fail to pay their debt on time.

programme.desc: Lakshmi's family slams her for trying to expose Shanaya in front of the media. However, Rishi soon takes a stand for Lakshmi.

programme.desc: As Lakshmi apologises to Rishi for ruining his name, they share a few intimate moments. Meanwhile, Malishka continues to believe that Rishi loves her.

programme.desc: Nakshatra meets Shakuntala Devi and begs for forgiveness for her past mistakes. On the other hand, Shwetha and Milli plan to ruin Nakshatra's reputation.

programme.desc: Determined to cure Rocky of his ailment, Maasi decides to conduct an elaborate ritual called 'Kaat Nidra'. Meanwhile, Sanchit's revelations about Ayodhya's visit to his room shock Sudhakar and Sapna.

programme.desc: When Karthik refuses to elope with his lover, Pallavi, she decides to marry Arun and emigrates to France. However, madly in love, Karthik follows her to France a year later to win her heart back.

programme.title: Goli Soda 2
programme.desc: A taxi driver, a gangster and an athlete want to create a space for themselves. However, when fate strikes, they end up losing everything and their struggle towards reclaiming their lives begins.

programme.title: Bhagya Laxmi Ep58
programme.desc: Following Rishi's arrest, Malishka pays Rishi a visit at the police station and holds his hand which makes Lakshmi feel uncomfortable.

programme.desc: Rishi's family is shocked to learn that Lakshmi is out to settle scores with Shanaya. They then strive to stop Lakshmi from executing her plan.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep82
programme.desc: Overtaken by guilt, Shikha decides to disclose the truth while the Rajput family mourns Sanchit's death. However, Pavitra steps in and graciously takes the blame for Sanchit's death.

programme.desc: Determined to complete his mission, Dadaji attacks the Rajput family while Pavitra tries her best to defend them. Meanwhile, Rani seeks help from a demon to settle scores with Pavitra.

programme.title: Pishachini Ep84
programme.desc: Kanika places a burning stone on Pavitra's palm to prevent her from freezing while Rocky tries to find a way out. Later, Shikha reveals her role in Sanchit's death.

programme.title: What You Don't Know About Me
programme.desc: Ikendu, a Malian immigrant, falls in love with Patricia in an Italian-speaking town of Switzerland. When he is falsely accused of drug dealing by corrupt policemen, the couple’s relationship is put to the test as they discover each other’s secrets.

programme.title: Gold Runner
programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: The Girl With Nine Wigs
programme.desc: Sophie has just started her studies, but her life is turned upside down when she is diagnosed with cancer. However, her lust for life drives her to break free from her illness, and she does so with nine wigs, each bringing out an aspect of herself.

programme.title: Wars
programme.desc: Following in her father’s footsteps, and yearning to fill the existential emptiness within her, 20-year-old Emma decides to join the army. In an environment of harsh discipline and repressive rules, Emma unexpectedly falls in love with her superior.

programme.title: Unrelated
programme.desc: Starring Tom Hiddleston (Thor) and newcomer Kathryn Worth, Unrelated is a terse and gripping psychodrama that focuses on a childless Anna who’s dissatisfied with her marriage. She soon falls for another man but her demons soon return to haunt her.

programme.title: Adam
programme.desc: Abla runs a modest local bakery from her home in Casablanca where she lives alone with her 8-year-old daughter, Warda. When Samia, a young pregnant woman knocks on their door, Abla is far from imagining that her life will change forever.

programme.title: A Summer In Cyprus
programme.desc: Tina reluctantly takes her son, Mortiz, on a trip to Cyprus to reunite with her summer fling, who is now married and refusing his paternity. However, Moritz’s determination to reconnect with his roots also brings turbulence to Aiven’s marriage.

programme.title: Almanya-Willkommen in Deutschland
programme.desc: A migrant Turkish family living in Almanya, Germany struggles with the question: what is really “home” as they decide to return to Turkey? As they reminisce, quarrel, and reconcile, the journey takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: A Summer In Brittany
programme.desc: Brimming with anticipation, recently separated veterinarian Britta embarks on a long-awaited vacation in the French province of Brittany and accidentally runs over fisherman Yves.

programme.title: Silenced Tree
programme.desc: Hayati is a small-town literature teacher and author who can’t move on from his past: his failing marriage, his sick mother, a decaying walnut tree, and memories of his father. When his wife’s body is found, the innocent Hayati confesses to the murder.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Yusuf’s best friend, Memo falls gravely ill. Isolated in their boarding school located in the snowy mountains, tensions run high as Yusuf’s calls for help for Memo becomes increasingly difficult in the face of an authoritarian and bureaucratic system.

programme.title: Take Me Home
programme.desc: Take Me Home is an epic tale following the journey of a family on the verge of falling apart as they attempt to smuggle their dead grandmother across the Singapore-Malaysia border.

programme.title: A Summer In Mykonos
programme.desc: A mother-daughter vacation turns into a surprise for Jana when her mother Susanne unexpectedly sets up a meeting between her and her father, Jens. As Susanne tries to secretly rope Jens into funding Jana’s studies, Jana seeks solace with the kindly Nikos.

A traffic accident in which Camilla, a lawyer, is involved results in the death of a young man. This forces her to investigate and face unfamiliar places and situations. While on this journey, she will meet Bruno and rediscover herself.

programme.title: A Summer in Sicily
programme.desc: Sandra, a young and passionate oenologist, goes to Sicily in search of a special grape variety but meets a mysterious shipwrecked man who washes up on a beach. However, the man’s past comes back to haunt them.

programme.title: Brother's Keeper

programme.title: Catch Of The Day
programme.desc: Alex, a driven young man, is forced to leave Hamburg for his small hometown to care for his sick father. With his finances running dry, he tries in vain to sell the family house and ends up resorting to hilarious measures to enhance its property value.

programme.title: LUV
programme.desc: Set in the Baltimore crime world, a fatherless eleven-year-old boy learns about adulthood when he spends a day with his ex-convict uncle whom he idolizes. He becomes witness to the ugliness of drug dealings and the haunting pain of past mistakes in life.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: Pelican Blood
programme.desc: Weibke and her nine-year-old daughter Nicolina are elated when they finally adopt five-year-old Raya. However, Weibke soon notices Raya displaying abnormally aggressive behavior. With advice from experts, Weibke is forced to make a painful decision.

They all get harsh reviews from celebrities like Danny Bonaduce and Leif Garrett, plus hot comics like Mike Trainor.

programme.desc: Kuala Lumpur to Johor Bahru - In Kuala Lumpur, Michael tries the ancient art of pewter smithing and learns how the discovery of tin transformed a muddy estuary into Malaysia's thriving capital.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Vacuum Cleaners - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey reveal the secrets behind production on an epic scale. This time they discover how a humble but hardy 'Henry' the vacuum cleaner is produced.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode, on-board cameras make amazing discoveries about devil rays, bears and livestock guard dogs.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Seal the Deal - After losing a cache of winter meat last season, Kim and Pierre look to the land for a source of emergency food. Bentley and his wife Felica explore Schade Lake, hunting for early season beaver, and in his on-going quest to pad his winter larder Jon takes to the sea in search of seal.

programme.title: Robson Green Grand Slam Fishing S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Seward - Robson travels to Seward, Alaska, where he must catch three species of fish from a set list in a single day, but first he trains in Homer where the halibut are enormous!

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep10
programme.desc: Tortilla chips - Gregg Wallace visits the biggest tortilla factory in Europe, while Cherry Healey takes on the hottest chilli in the world and Ruth Goodman reveals how the Elizabethans treated their ruff collars.

programme.title: Seven Worlds, One Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Asia - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Asia and the rarely-observed inhabitants that roam the mountains, deserts and jungles.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Switzerland via Alpina: Part 2 - Join Ryan and his team as they continue the mammoth trek that began in Vaduz, Liechtenstein, meeting a fascinating collection of characters along their path, as they draw ever closer to their goal of arriving in Montreux on the shores of Lake Geneva, in this double episode of Extreme Treks.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Sweden - Ben Fogle returns to Sweden to visit Annalisa, an Italian living in the deep woods with her young son Nico.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Robson is on the trail of tuna, machaca and the mighty sail fish off the coast of Costa Rica in Central America.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep1
programme.desc: Diggers - Gregg Wallace and Cherry Healey get special access to a factory that makes as many as a hundred iconic yellow diggers every single day.

programme.title: Wild Oman: Wonder of Arabia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Sultanate of Oman is the Middle East's best kept secret. It is a corner of Arabia of unparalleled beauty and unexpected landscapes. It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Alexander visits the awesome Gyeongbokgung Palace, picks something up at the vast Yangnyeongsi herbal market, and even takes a look at the lucrative culture of fortune-telling.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazaré in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, we use specialist jet-ski cameras to ride the waves.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Louisiana - Robson is in America's deep south on the Tennessee River where he catches catfish in his hands. Then he's off to the Gulf of Mexico for blackfin tuna.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Top of the South/ Te Tau Ihu - Uncover a land of opposites atop New Zealand’s South Island, where one of the world’s longest sandbars attracts bar-tailed godwits and hungry pilot whales, and drowned river valleys provide a buffet for dusky dolphins and New Zealand fur seals.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Costa Rica: Sky to Sea - Costa Rica is a world of its own - a tropical corridor squeezed between two great oceans, powered by raging rivers and simmering volcanoes. As its volcanoes erupt, they deposit minerals into the soil, making the land fertile and creating the country’s rich biodiversity.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Wild Seas - On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canada’s Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - They are Europe’s biggest terrestrial mammals and the last wild bovine species on the continent. Once the European bison, also known as Wisent, roamed most of the old world, but, unlike its close relative on the other side of the Atlantic, it was hunted to complete extinction by the early 20th century. Only by ambitious rewilding undertakings is it nowadays possible to see these fascinating animals in their natural habitats again.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Refugees of Laikipia - The mass relocation of an endangered species of Hartebeest from a game reserve to Ol Pejeta, so the land can be resettled by refugees.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return to the Mara - Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Golden Forest - This is the story of the “Golden Forest”, the vast expanses of kelp that lines Africa’s southwestern shore. Fed by an upwelling of nutrients from deep in the Atlantic, the kelp forest nurtures four distinct worlds.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Out of the Darkness - Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return of the Light - Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep3
programme.desc: White Rhinos of Enasoit - The conservation team attempts to move two white rhinos to Ol Pejeta from the nearby Enasoit ranch after it is discovered that poachers have been watching the animals.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Out of the Darkness - Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - They are Europe’s biggest terrestrial mammals and the last wild bovine species on the continent. Only by ambitious rewilding undertakings is it nowadays possible to see these fascinating animals in their natural habitats again.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fugitive Giants - With elephant numbers on the rise, so too are the conflicts Ol Pejeta has to deal with, like a gang of crop-raiding Pachyderms. The order is given to detusk three of the problem animals, but first the team will have to remove a collar from a blind elephant.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Tides of Sweetwater - A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colobus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Coastal Africa 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Algoa Bay: Last Refuge of the African Penguin - The population of African penguins in Southern Africa is on the decline, but the charismatic species has found a stronghold on two islands in Algoa Bay. This is the story of the penguins’ daily struggle to raise families in an unforgiving and hostile environment.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of China’s land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Wild Seas - On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canada’s Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.
