programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ngorongoro - Explores the Ngorogoro’s highlands and caldera on the edge of the Serengeti. The caldera is a wildlife haven that some have called a modern day Eden because of the density and diversity of its wildlife. That includes some of the last of Africa’s “tuskers.”

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Tides of Sweetwater - A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colobus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Wild Seas - On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canada’s Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Return of the European Bison - They are Europe’s biggest terrestrial mammals and the last wild bovine species on the continent. Once the European bison, also known as Wisent, roamed most of the old world, but, unlike its close relative on the other side of the Atlantic, it was hunted to complete extinction by the early 20th century. Only by ambitious rewilding undertakings is it nowadays possible to see these fascinating animals in their natural habitats again.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi - Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Journey Begins - The source of the Mekong River is high up in the Tibetan plateau, from there it flows into Yunnan Province, China, where our journey begins. Even though Yunnan occupies less than 4% of China’s land, it is home to over half of its birds and mammals.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Village Raiders - Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Relentless Sun - A once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers and the conservation team is struggling to keep up with the swath of thirsty creatures. While some animals succumb to dehydration, the team must concentrate its efforts on a particularly vulnerable - and dangerous - water buffalo.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snows of Kilimanjaro - Mt. Kilimanjaro is the highest freestanding peak in Africa, it has five separate climatic zones. Jean Du Plessis is making his first climb to the peak. His mission is to see whether climate change is affecting the snow on the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Arabian Inferno 1 Ep1
programme.desc: When the Rain Comes - The Arabian landscape is a virtually waterless desert where rain scarcely falls and animals endure blistering temperatures. But for 3 months every year, a remote region on the south west coast undergoes an astonishing transformation… into a lush, verdant oasis.

programme.title: The Living Beach 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - It’s a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creature Comforts - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a troop of rescue center monkeys that have adopted a litter of stray kittens, a loyal dog helping a rescued raccoon overcome her fears, and an emu raised by Irish setters.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Heidelberg - Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Walking with a Pangolin - Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers’ dogs.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tsiba's New Mum - Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars S1 Ep7
programme.desc: It's the semi-final. But Gordon Ramsay will only invest in someone who is future facing. Who can make a splash on social media?

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Victoria and Raheel - Two architects compete using virtual reality to remodel a 1990s build in Milton Keynes. Will the finished design fulfill the dreams of the family of six who live there?

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Liam and Hannah's Shepherd's Hut - Situated in a water meadow in north Dorset, rare breed farmers Liam and Hannah's 1930s shepherd's hut was bought for just £5 almost 40 years ago. Simon and the team help them to restore it.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Faith's Geodome - Simon and the team go to Devon where camp site owner Faith wants to create a unique property using an invention of her late father's. Faith wants the B&B's rooms to have a celestial theme.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Fall family's clutter has been spiralling out of control since they moved into their home four years ago. Stacey Solomon and her team help them get it under control.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The remaining five cooks create two dishes that are judged on how they look when professionally photographed and how they rate on Jamie's social media snap poll.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars S1 Ep7
programme.desc: It's the semi-final. But Gordon Ramsay will only invest in someone who is future facing. Who can make a splash on social media?

programme.desc: Nigella's grandmother's recipe for creme caramel provides the inspiration for a simple but elegant dessert of caramel custard.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The remaining five cooks create two dishes that are judged on how they look when professionally photographed and how they rate on Jamie's social media snap poll.

programme.desc: Ruben's Cob House - When 17-year-old Ruben told his parents, Helen and Tim, that he wanted to build a mud hut in their Oxfordshire garden as his A-level project, they had no idea how much work they would all have to put into it.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Julie and Toby's Castle Turret - Simon's team is in Warwickshire to turn a 200-year-old turret into a medieval-themed B&B. The tiny two-floored building may look like a turret on the outside, but on the inside it's a bland office.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Mangwon - In Seoul Donal visits Mangwon market with TV Chef Wonil Lee for a history of Korean baking. He finds there are new cake, bread and confectionary businesses buzzing with excitement. While in Seoul he makes Black Sesame Scones with Chef Wonil.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep3
programme.desc: From Bean to Bar - Rachel explores chocolate's versatility. She mixes it with savoury in a polpette penne, and in Stockholm she learns about pairing drink with chocolate.

programme.desc: It's the final, and Gordon puts the remaining three businesses under scrutiny. Who will win his £150,000 investment and become his future food star?

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the other’s daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep28
programme.desc: Lucky and the No-Good Outlaw Butch Lepray - Lucky gets into trouble when the circus picks up a stranded woman who isn't what she seems

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep2
programme.desc: While You Weren't Sleeping / The Secret Strife of Pets - Sick of nighttime cutting fun short, the kids pulls an all-nighter. A mystery critter shows up on Harvey Street and Dot wants it gone!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep2
programme.desc: Delivery Disaster / Slippery Business - When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the other’s daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep3
programme.desc: Imperfect Harmony - The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep22
programme.desc: Too Many Bens! / Dance of the Machines - A lack of predators in the new yard has led to an infestation of Bens, and they are looking for playmates. / The new humans that live in the house notices there’s dirt in their yard (i.e. our heroes) so they release a cleaning robot which becomes a deadly menace.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold’s latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep3
programme.desc: Royal Review / Funishment - Poppy faces her first royal review as Queen and sets out to ensure 100 happiness in Troll VillagePoppy must figure out how to handle crime in Troll Village when Cooper steals a pie.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.desc: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.desc: When Darkness Falls - On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 2 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep22
programme.desc: Too Many Bens! / Dance of the Machines - A lack of predators in the new yard has led to an infestation of Bens, and they are looking for playmates. / The new humans that live in the house notices there’s dirt in their yard (i.e. our heroes) so they release a cleaning robot which becomes a deadly menace.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep2
programme.desc: Sphinx - Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic substance that will ultimately make them explode. The only cure is guarded by a Sphinx who challenges Puss with riddles - and contrary to his own belief, Puss is not good at riddles.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep59
programme.desc: My Friend Fifi - Fifi and Bumble fall out in a big way after Fifi doesn't show up to the picnic they are supposed to have together. How strange that Stingo is trying to get them to be friends again, or is it?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep60
programme.desc: Diggly's Big Adventure - Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep5
programme.desc: Who Did I Hear In The Big Hollow Log? - Jess is searching for Horace by the pond but he's nowhere to be found. When he calls into a hollow log and his voice echo's back, Jess thinks it's the voice of a new friend and sets about trying to work out where the friend is. By using comparisons and clever thinking, Jess works out that it's not someone else - it's his voice bouncing off the log. It's an echo,

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep6
programme.desc: What Can We Do With Mimi's Rubbish? - Jess is off to play painting and gluing with his pink rabbit friend Mimi. He's very excited. But when he arrives Mimi's hutch is overflowing with rubbish and there's no space for their art project. Jess works out how to get the rubbish out of the hutch using recyclling re-using and re-pairing.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep7
programme.desc: Who Wants To Live In Baa's Meadow? - Baa's feeling lonely as his buddy Billie the mouse has gone off for the day. Jess goes hunting for someone to come to the meadow to live with Baa. He find a fish to live in the trough, but there's no pond weed for him to live, he tries Sammy snail but he carries his own home on his back so he doesn't need a new home, finally they realise that there are ants already living with Baa in the meadow.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep8
programme.desc: Why Are The Ants Visiting Mimi? - Mimi's painting a lovely picture at her hutch, with Jess along for a visit. Suddenly she's collapses in fits of tickly giggles, there are ants everywhere.. Mimi can't paint, tho, whilst she's being tickled and Jess works out they are here for her honey sandwiches!

programme.title: Olivia Ep5
programme.desc: Olivia Takes A Road Trip - On the looooong drive to Grandma's house, Olivia finds ways to pass the time. She imagines her family traveling in style, as she pilots her very own jumbo jet–Olivia Air! By the time they arrive at Grandma's, Olivia's had so much fun that the discomfort of the road trip has been forgotten.

programme.title: Olivia Ep6
programme.desc: Olivia Goes International - When asked to give a presentation for her class's International Day. Olivia can't decide which country to choose. Being Olivia she invents her own country –Olivitania -where cupcakes are the national food and the national anthem sounds suspiciously like Puccini.

programme.title: Olivia Ep7
programme.desc: Olivia And Her Alien Brother - After a trip to the planetarium, Ian's knowledge about space and his peculiar behaviour lead Olivia to believe that her brother is an alien. Olivia soon discovers his secret…he's making a special gift for his favourite sister

programme.title: Olivia Ep8
programme.desc: Olivia Plants A Garden - When Mrs. Hogenmuller distributes seeds for a class garden project, Olivia just can't wait for her plants to grow. But when her dog Perry digs up her little garden, Olivia discovers something even more exciting – what appears to be a dinosaur bone!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep5
programme.desc: Why Hen Pecks The Ground - You see there was a time when Hen didn't peck the ground. She was a proud mother who spent all her time looking after and cleaning her chicks. Fancy pancy Peacock upsets Mama Hen and makes her feel plain. All the animals are furious with Snooty Peacock… but the damage has been done. Eagle – Mama Hen's best friend – decides to lend Hen her most prized possession – A needle! And Mama Hen sews herself the most beautiful coat of new feathers. Everyone is delighted and they dance and dance and dance. But Mama Hen forgets all about the needle and it gets lost in all the dust. Eagle's precious needle! From that day on Hen always pecks the ground looking for the needle to return to her friend. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep6
programme.desc: Why Bat Hangs Upside Down - You see there was a time when Bat didn't hang upside down. He used to fly all over Tinga Tinga, saying ‘Boo!' to all the animals and giving them a fright. Nothing could be more fun for Bat. But one day Bat went too far… and the animals decided to give Bat a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep7
programme.desc: Why Warthog Is Ugly - You see there was a time when Warthog was really rather handsome. And did he know it! He strutted around Tinga Tinga as if he owned the place. All the animals were fed up with Warthog's boasting, and then one day Lion decided to give chase. Yikes! Warthog ran headfirst into Porcupines burrow! After that, he was no longer the prettiest beast in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep8
programme.desc: Why Owls Head Turns All The Way Round - You see there was a time when Owl's head didn't turn all the way round. She had tiny little eyes and tiny little ears, and she found it very hard to stay awake. Then one day all the Mangoes started disappearing in Tinga Tinga. Against all the animals better judgement, Owl was ordered to watch over the Mango tree … but the mangoes kept disappearing. Desperate to catch the thief, Owl stretched and strained to see who was stealing the precious mangoes, until Ker-Swhing! Her head turned all the way round and she saw who it was… It was the ants! From that day on Owl was made the official night guard of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevin’s “jokes.” Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his “comedian’s disease.” Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep55
programme.desc: Caballo Sin Cabeza - When the famous headless horse shows up in town, the San Lorenzans must turn to an unlikely hero to help save the day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep29
programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that it’s time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep29
programme.desc: Dance Dance Resolution - After reuniting with his parents, King Julien doesn't want them to leave so he recreates a booty-shaking dance recital they had never seen.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep29
programme.desc: Lucky and the Big Goodbye - While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep3
programme.desc: Boo to You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sleepy Toys - Everyone in Brickabuild keeps falling asleep and no one can get any building work finished. It's all because the lights keep coming on all night! Noddy decides to investigate who is turning the lights on. Bravely overcoming his own fear of the dark, he follows the clues to discover that the lights are being secretly turned on by a scared Carlton, who doesn't like the dark. Kind Noddy tells him that he's not the only one scared of the dark and after Carlton is given a cuddle device to cuddle, everyone can get a good night's sleep! Sleep tight, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Secret Deliveries - Someone is giving presents to everyone in Toyland and all the toys want to say thank you but no one knows the identity of the secret gift giver! It's up to Noddy to investigate and find out who is it that's leaving presents for all the friends. By following clues and using his investigation skills, Noddy follows the trail to Animal Acres and discovers that Pat Pat and the Pockets are the secret gift-givers. Kind Noddy has a great idea and when Pat Pat makes her final delivery she finds a big pile of presents waiting for her from all her grateful friends. Thank you Pat Pat! And thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep29
programme.desc: The Fluffberg Method / Singing Tele-Grammers - When Dr. Fluffberg is outed as not being a real doctor, Archibald must help him through medical school where students are put through the trials of a simulated hospital. / Archibald dons the mantle of a singing telegrammer but runs into trouble when he loses the official “Grammer” songbook.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep3
programme.desc: Wet Hot Ahhh Valley Summer / Grug Vs The Moon - When Eep and Thunk challenge each other in the first-ever dare-off, Thunk faces the deep end - his greatest fear; Grug picks a fight with the moon.

Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.desc: Adventures in Babysitting - Theodore gets roped into doing Alvin's babysitting sitting job with a spoiled four year old.

programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.desc: Day of the Dad / Small Blunder - Lori struggles to make a good impression on Bobby's dad after accidentally pushing him into a puddle. // Desperate to have the best show-and-tell in class, Lily takes Lisa's shrink ray to school.

programme.desc: Squid Plus One / The Executive Treatment - After receiving an invitation to a gallery opening, Squidward scrambles to find a friend to take with him. // While trying to order a special sandwich, Patrick gets swept up in the fast paced world of business.

programme.title: Dig More Japan

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Watanave Hidenori is working on a project to track war damage in Ukraine amid the Russian invasion through digital maps that utilize satellite images. He talks about the power of digital tools.

programme.title: Journeys In Japan
programme.desc: A noted local photographer takes Michael Keida deep into the tropical rainforests of Amami-Oshima to point out the island's "living fossils" by day and night. Michael also mingles with the locals.

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Prelims - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Strickland Vs. Magomedov
programme.desc: Main Event - After a spectacular UFC debut that saw him end Dustin Stoltzfus’ night in just 19 seconds, Abus Magomedov will step squarely into the main event spotlight on July 1 when he faces perennial middleweight contender Sean Strickland in the headliner of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. A Top 10 stalwart fighting in his adopted hometown, Strickland has already won three UFC main events over Uriah Hall, Jack Hermansson and Nassourdine Imavov, and now he’ll look to halt the rise of Magomedov, who brings a three-fight winning streak into this intriguing bout.
